Pre-Game Insights: The game is a rematch of last season's Eastern Conference Finals
The Pacers won the first game of the season series on Oct. 30, but the Celtics won the second game on Dec. 27 with a dominating 142-105 victory
The Pacers have lost two in a row after going on a five-game winning streak from Dec. 13 to Dec. 23
The Celtics were back to their winning ways after losing two straight games against the Orlando Magic on Dec. 23 and the Philadelphia 76ers on Christmas
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled to take place at the TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts at 6:00 p.m. ET
It will be televised locally on FanDuel Sports Network Indiana and NBC Sports Boston
Fans can also watch it via live stream on NBA League Pass and FuboTV
Others: The odds for the game are Moneyline: Pacers (+472) vs. Celtics (-650)
Total (O/U): Pacers o233.5 (-110) vs. Celtics u233.5 (-114)
Tyrese Haliburton has an over/under of 17.5 points
Pascal Siakam is averaging 19.9 ppg this season and is favored to go over 18.5 points
Jayson Tatum is having an MVP-caliber season, averaging 28.7 ppg this season
Jaylen Brown scored a season-high 44 points on Friday against the Pacers
